pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.4.0, Glyphs! $(li)Adds the Exchange Glyph - swaps block and entities!$(li)Adds the Intangible Glyph - turns blocks temporarily into air.$(li)Adds the Wither Glyph.$(li)Adds the Duration Down Glyph, reduces potion effects and time-based effects.$(li)Adds the Invisibility Glyph.$(li)Nerfs the base leap distance.

$(li)Fixes carbuncles roaming away if they are not given a chest position.$(li)Fixes carbuncles being unclickable with the dominion wand.$(li)Fixes duplicate casting by Place Block.$(li)Fixes random particle bugs.$(li)Item Pickup range increased.$(li)Harm Amplify damage has been reduced.$(li)Fangs now do too much damage.

$(li)Delay base duration has been increased.$(li)Fortune is now more expensive.$(li)AOE is slightly cheaper.$(li)Amplify is slightly more expensive.$(li)Fixes directional bug with Spell Turrets using touch.
